original: Ekoti puggalo vā me dutiyo natthi, dhammo vā me dutiyo natthi, yaṁ vā puggalaṁ nissāya

original: Atha vā aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko.

original: saddhādhanaṁ sīladhanaṁ hiridhanaṁ ottappadhanaṁ sutadhanaṁ cāgadhanaṁ paññādhanaṁ satipaṭṭhānadhanaṁ …pe…
analyzed: saddhā dhanam sīla dhanam hiri dhanam ottappa dhanam suta dhanam cāga dhanam paññā dhanam sati paṭṭhāna dhanam pe

original: Imehi anekehi dhanaratanehi aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko.
analyzed: imehi anekehi dhana ratanehi aḍḍhaḥ mahaddhanaḥ sakkaḥ

original: Atha vā sakko pahu visavī alamatto sūro vīro vikkanto abhīrū achambhī anutrāsī apalāyī pahīnabhayabheravo vigatalomahaṁsotipi sakkoti—

original: Ākiñcaññaṁ pekkhamāno satimāti so brāhmaṇo pakatiyā ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiṁ lābhīyeva nissayaṁ na jānāti—

original: Ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiṁ sato samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā tattha jāte cittacetasike dhamme aniccato pekkhamāno, dukkhato …pe…
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatana samāpattim sataḥ samāpajjitvā tatas vuṭṭhahitvā tattha jāte citta cetasike dhamme aniccataḥ pekkhamāno dukkhataḥ pe

original: Imāya satiyā upeto hoti …pe… samannāgato, so vuccati satimāti—

original: Upasīvāti bhagavā taṁ brāhmaṇaṁ nāmena ālapati.

original: Bhagavāti gāravādhivacanametaṁ …pe… sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṁ bhagavāti—

original: Natthīti nissāya tarassu oghanti natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti.

original: Viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiṁ sato samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā taññeva viññāṇaṁ abhāveti, vibhāveti, antaradhāpeti, natthi kiñcīti passati.
